name: [UPISwitch] [PROD] [AXIS Bank] DevOps Handbook.txt - AWS Cloud
description: This section provides information about the AWS (Amazon Web Services) cloud account and region used for hosting the infrastructure related to the UPISwitch AXIS Bank project. It specifies the account ID and the primary data center region, which is Mumbai (ap-south-1). This information is crucial for accessing and managing the cloud resources associated with the project.
use_cases: Accessing and managing cloud resources for the UPISwitch AXIS Bank project
Identifying the primary data center region for the project's infrastructure
Verifying the account ID for authentication and authorization purposes
Referencing the account and region details for any cloud-related operations or troubleshooting

name: [UPISwitch] [PROD] [AXIS Bank] DevOps Handbook.txt - AWS ReadOnly Access - Developers
description: This section provides instructions for developers to obtain read-only access to AWS resources, likely for monitoring or auditing purposes. It outlines the steps to request and activate the necessary access package from Microsoft MyAccess and the Azure portal.
use_cases: Granting read-only access to AWS resources for developers
Monitoring or auditing AWS resources
Accessing AWS resources for non-production purposes

name: [UPISwitch] [PROD] [AXIS Bank] DevOps Handbook.txt - Domains
description: This section explains the different domains or URLs used for accessing the UPISwitch service provided by Razorpay for AXIS Bank. It distinguishes between the external domain, which is accessible from the internet, and the internal domain, which is likely used within the organization's network. The external domain is *.prod.axis.razorpayupis.com, while the internal domain is *.int.prod.axis.razorpayupis.com. This information is useful for configuring access to the service and understanding the different environments or deployment setups.
use_cases: Accessing the UPISwitch service from the internet
Accessing the UPISwitch service from within the organization's network
Configuring access to different environments (e.g., production, staging)
Understanding the deployment architecture and network segmentation

name: [UPISwitch] [PROD] [AXIS Bank] DevOps Handbook.txt - Tools
description: This section provides an overview of various tools and platforms used for monitoring, visualizing, and managing secrets in the production environment of the UPISwitch system for Axis Bank. It lists the URLs for accessing Grafana (a data visualization tool), CredstashUI (a Kubernetes secret management tool), and Coralogix (a log and trace management platform).
use_cases: Monitoring and visualizing system metrics and logs
Managing and securing sensitive information (secrets) in a Kubernetes environment
Centralized log and trace management for troubleshooting and analysis

name: [UPISwitch] [PROD] [AXIS Bank] DevOps Handbook.txt - Terraform
description: This section provides links to two web-based tools used in the production environment for the AXIS Bank project at Razorpay. Redash is a business intelligence (BI) tool that allows users to query and visualize data from various sources. KafkaUI is a user interface for managing and monitoring Apache Kafka, a distributed streaming platform used for building real-time data pipelines and streaming applications.
use_cases: Data analysis and reporting
Data visualization
Monitoring and managing Kafka clusters
Building real-time data pipelines
capabilities: Redash: BI tool for data querying and visualization
KafkaUI: User interface for Apache Kafka management

name: [UPISwitch] [PROD] [AXIS Bank] DevOps Handbook.txt - GitOps
description: This section provides a link to the Vishnu repository on GitHub, which contains Terraform configuration files for managing infrastructure resources related to the UPISwitch PROD environment for AXIS Bank in the ap-south-1 AWS region. Terraform is an open-source infrastructure as code (IaC) tool that allows you to define and provision cloud resources using declarative configuration files.
use_cases: Infrastructure as Code (IaC)
Cloud resource provisioning
Configuration management
Version control for infrastructure

name: [UPISwitch] [PROD] [AXIS Bank] DevOps Handbook.txt - Alerts
description: This section provides information about various repositories and resources related to the DevOps infrastructure for the UPISwitch AXIS Bank production environment. It includes links to repositories for managing infrastructure manifests, GitOps workflows, and alert rules. The section seems to serve as a centralized reference for developers and operations teams to access and maintain different components of the DevOps setup.
use_cases: Managing infrastructure manifests for the UPISwitch AXIS Bank production environment
Implementing GitOps workflows for continuous deployment and management
Configuring and maintaining alert rules for monitoring and incident response
Providing a centralized reference for DevOps resources and repositories
